message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the reaction between sulfuric acid (H2SO4) and sodium hydroxide (NaOH) to produce sodium sulfate (Na2SO4) and water (H2O)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the reaction between sulfuric acid (H2SO4) and sodium hydroxide (NaOH) to produce sodium sulfate (Na2SO4) and water (H2O) is:

H2SO4 + 2NaOH â†’ Na2SO4 + 2H2O
